page.title: 06RECREATION IN INVERURIE
page.content:
There are a variety of recreational facilities in and around Inverurie.
The Community Centre has a Swimming Pool and a Games Hall, which are used by Inverurie Academy, but are also available to the general public. The games hall can accommodate badminton, squash, indoor bowling etc.
The centre is used by various groups, but it also has Community Workers employed who organise activities for the community.
For the young there are Youth Clubs and Discos. A new group recently formed is the Garioch Adventure Club who organise activities for families.The Community Centre also caters very well for the disabled.
